keyMoments.title: Baskerville's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Baskerville, the Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, makes his debut as the de facto commander coordinating the defense against the Straw Hat invasion.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Enies Lobby's commander and revelation of the three-person character concept.

keyMoments.title: Commands Watchdog Unit Deployment
keyMoments.description: Baskerville sends one hundred members of the Watchdog Unit to defend against the invaders after learning that Oimo is being overwhelmed.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Baskerville's role as tactical commander of Enies Lobby's forces.

reveals.information: Baskerville is actually three men (Bas, And, and Kerville) working together in a costume to appear as one individual
Chief Justice of Enies Lobby and de facto commander during Spandam's absence

keyMoments.title: Bas Revealed as Part of Baskerville
keyMoments.description: Bas is one of the three men who make up Baskerville. He is 48 years old with short stubby legs and a disproportionately large left arm.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the unique three-person character concept.

keyMoments.title: And Revealed as Part of Baskerville
keyMoments.description: And is one of the three men who make up Baskerville. He is 53 years old with a white beard, lanky upper body, and disproportionately large legs.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the unique three-person character concept.

reveals.information: Proposes bizarre compromises between Bas and Kerville's opposing views

keyMoments.title: Kerville Revealed as Part of Baskerville
keyMoments.description: Kerville is one of the three men who make up Baskerville. He is 42 years old with short stubby legs and a disproportionately large right arm.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the unique three-person character concept.

reveals.information: Advocates for acquittal in judgments, opposing Bas's view

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Kazan Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates the Gomu Gomu no Kazan (Gum-Gum Volcano) technique, stretching his foot upward to attack Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's continued development of new Devil Fruit techniques.

abilities.description: Luffy stretches his foot upward like a volcano eruption to break through ceilings or strike enemies from below. Similar to Gomu Gomu no Ono but with upward motion.

keyMoments.title: Yokozuna Bends the Gates
keyMoments.description: Yokozuna demonstrates his incredible strength by bending the outer fence of Enies Lobby inward to create a ramp for the Rocketman.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Yokozuna's immense power and enables the spectacular flying Rocketman sequence.

reveals.information: Yokozuna possesses enough strength to bend massive metal gates

keyMoments.title: Oimo Knocked Out by Rocketman
keyMoments.description: The flying Rocketman train crashes into Oimo's back, knocking the giant unconscious and removing him as a defensive obstacle.
keyMoments.significance: Defeats one of Enies Lobby's giant guards through the momentum of the rescue party's assault.

keyMoments.title: Paulie's Top Knot Rope Technique
keyMoments.description: Paulie demonstrates his rope-based fighting techniques during the assault on Enies Lobby.

keyMoments.title: Paulie Injured by Watchdog Unit
keyMoments.description: Paulie is stabbed in the shoulder by a member of the Watchdog Unit but continues fighting.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the danger of the Watchdog Unit and Paulie's dedication to the rescue mission.

abilities.description: Paulie's signature rope-based fighting style used to bind and attack enemies.

keyMoments.title: Brought Before Spandam
keyMoments.description: Franky is presented to Spandam alongside Robin, marking a critical moment in the rescue mission.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the urgency as Franky is now in CP9's custody.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Spandam
keyMoments.description: Upon being brought before Spandam, Franky directly attacks him, demonstrating his defiance.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's character and unwillingness to cooperate with the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Brought Before Spandam
keyMoments.description: Robin is presented to Spandam, the leader of CP9, marking the culmination of her capture.
keyMoments.significance: The person the entire rescue mission is aimed at saving is now directly in the hands of the World Government leader.
